title.rendered: CAS/Library Event: Teaching with Data, November 10, 2016

content.rendered:
Please join us as we explore theoretical and practical considerations for integrating the use of data into the classroom. During the first hour, hear from colleagues across the disciplines talk about teaching in the context of new data techniques. The second portion will involve hands-on activities, including creating datasets, integrating data-specific activities into your syllabus, and finding support. Sponsored by the College of Arts & Science and NYU Data Services. See complete agenda at: tinyurl.com/teachingwithdata

To RSVP, click here.
